name: @healthifyme/server
description: web server for healthifyme front end applications
author: hannad rehman

scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=development&& export NODE_ENV_PORT=3000 && yarn start:lint
scripts.start:cluster: export NODE_ENV=development&& export NODE_ENV_PORT=3000&& yarn start:lint:cluster
scripts.build: yarn clean && export NODE_ENV=production && yarn transpile && node ./build
